entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022
